{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[reach]] the [[end]] or [[limit]]; to [[exhaust]]
# to [[study]] [[intensively]]; to [[research]]
# to [[investigate]]; to [[scrutinise]]
# [[after all]]; [[actually]]; [[in fact]]
